name: .NTC File Extension
type_name: Camera Control Pro Custom Curves File
summary: Learn about .NTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Curves file used by Nikon Camera Control Pro, a program used to touch-up pictures taken by Nikon digital cameras; contains color modifications that can be applied to photos and other images; often used to store predefined adjustments that correct common shooting errors, such as overexposed or underexposed pictures.

content: NTC files can be saved and loaded from the "Edit Camera Curves" window in Camera Control Pro.

NOTE: Nikon Camera Control Pro was previously called Nikon Capture. Camera Control Pro 2 supports the following Nikon models: D3, D2Xs, D2X, D2Hs, D700, D300, D200, D100, D80, D70s, D70, D60, D50, D40X, D40.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
